user_question: What are the environmental impacts of Bitcoin mining and generate an image of a futuristic eco-friendly mining facility?
final_answer: Bitcoin mining has significant environmental impacts due to high energy consumption, contributing to carbon emissions. Image of a futuristic eco-friendly mining facility generated. Examples of renewable energy sources used in Bitcoin mining include solar power, wind energy, and hydropower.
